DOC.brief_summary: The aim study describe safety immunogenicity Fluzone Quadrivalent Fluzone Intradermal vaccine adult 18 < 65 year age , describe safety immunogenicity Fluzone Quadrivalent Fluzone High-Dose vaccine adult ≥ 65 year age . Primary Objective : - To describe safety 2013-2014 formulation Fluzone Quadrivalent Fluzone Intradermal vaccine adult 18 < 65 year age safety 2013-2014 formulation Fluzone Quadrivalent Fluzone High-Dose vaccine adult ≥ 65 year age . Observational objective : - To describe immunogenicity 2013-2014 formulation Fluzone Quadrivalent Fluzone Intradermal vaccine adult 18 < 65 year age immunogenicity 2013-2014 formulation Fluzone Quadrivalent Fluzone High-Dose vaccine adult ≥ 65 year age . - To evaluate compliance , term immunogenicity , study vaccine ( Fluzone Quadrivalent , Fluzone Intradermal , Fluzone High-Dose ) applicable age group historical requirement Committee Human Medicinal Products ( CHMP ) Note Guidance ( NfG ) CPMP/BWP/214/96 . - To submit serum select subject Center Biologics Evaluation Research ( CBER ) analysis World Health Organization ( WHO ) , Centers Disease Control Prevention ( CDC ) , Food Drug Administration ( FDA ) support formulation recommendation subsequent influenza vaccine .
DOC.brief_title: Study Fluzone® Quadrivalent , Fluzone® Intradermal , Fluzone® High-Dose Influenza Virus Vaccines Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Participants 18 < 65 year age enrollment randomize receive either Fluzone Quadrivalent Fluzone Intradermal vaccine . Participants ≥ 65 year age enrollment randomize receive either Fluzone Quadrivalent Fluzone High-Dose vaccine . Solicited adverse event ( AE ) information collect 7 day vaccination , unsolicited AE Serious adverse event information collect Visit 1 Visit 2 . Total duration participation study approximately 21 day .

History serious adverse reaction influenza vaccine Receipt vaccine within 30 day receive study vaccine , plan receive another vaccine Visit 2 .
